reviews.subject: Love!!!!!
reviews.comment: This is a wonderful game.  I LOVE SCARLET LIFE!!!
reviews.name: Mathew M

reviews.subject: Wowowowww!
reviews.comment: Scarlet Life is my favorite omg.
reviews.name: Evan

reviews.subject: I LOVE Scarlet Life
reviews.comment: This is a fantastic game. I love the music and interaction while playing. It makes me feel so alive. I love it so much that I can't stop playing...even my wife is getting addicted to it!! We play Scarlet Life levels during our dinner dates these days!!
reviews.name: Secret Admirer (SS)
